title: Game Show Buzzer!
summary: Want to host your own game show!
description: Want to host your own game show!  This application let's each player buzz in from their phone.  See the winner on a web status page.   Supports Google Wear and ChromeCast.See more information:http://cloud-buzzin.appspot.com/#/infoWARNING: This is just a demo application.   Not intended for broad usage.  That said, please send feedback
descriptionHTML:
Want to host your own game show! This application let's each player buzz in from their phone. See the winner on a web status page. Supports Google Wear and ChromeCast.

See more information:
http://cloud-buzzin.appspot.com/#/info


WARNING: This is just a demo application. Not intended for broad usage.

That said, please send feedback
comments: Absolutely great app. Want to play the Jeopardy board game without any fuss or hassle about who "buzzed in?" It's perfect, and Chromecast support makes it even better.
Used for office quiz. Great simple app
Chrases Not that good, having many problems. Recommend 'Sync Buzzer' instead. Also has multiplayer capability.
Okay It sometimes doesn't work! But over all its okay.
